objects.description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) has used DLL side-loading to evade anti-virus.(Citation: FireEye Clandestine Fox Part 2)(Citation: Dell TG-3390)(Citation: Stewart 2014)(Citation: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017)(Citation: Palo Alto PlugX June 2017)(Citation: Trend Micro DRBControl February 2020)(Citation: Profero APT27 December 2020)
